metadata.name: NGHTMRE Red Rocks 2022
metadata.description: Thank you for attending the first ever DRMVRSE show on April 15, 2022 at the legendary Red Rocks!! All attendees have the chance to mint their own DRMVRSE collectible proof of attendance NFT!! Holding this in your digital wallet will provide you merch discounts, meet n greets free tickets, automatic submission for NGHTMRE contests and giveaways, and much more!!
